mapper.insert: insert into farmers (open_id, name, introduce, image_address, cate, status) values (#{openId},#{farmers.name},#{farmers.introduce},#{farmers.imageAddress},#{farmers.cate},'已通过')
insert into goods (name, origin_id, image_address, category) VALUES (#{goods.name},#{goods.farmerId},#{goods.imageAddress},#{goods.category})
insert into resources (owner, cate, path_id) VALUES (#{owner},#{cate},#{id})
mapper.select: select resources.*,pd.url,pd.id as pathId from resources left join path_data pd on pd.id=resources.path_id where resources.cate=#{cate} and resources.owner=#{owner}

select g.id as id, g.image_address as imageUrl, g.name as name, g.category as category, f.name as origin, (gn.number-gn.sale_number) as number, gn.unit as numberUnit, gp.number as price, gp.unti as priceUnit from goods g left join farmers f on f.id=g.origin_id left join goods_number gn on gn.goods_id=g.id left join goods_price gp on gp.goods_id=g.id where f.id=#{farmerId} and g.if_delete=0

select od.*,gn.unit as numberUnit,`order`.put_time,g.image_address as imageUrl from `order` left join order_data od on `order`.id = od.order_id left join goods g on od.goods_id = g.id left join goods_price gp on g.id = gp.goods_id left join goods_number gn on g.id = gn.goods_id where g.origin_id=#{farmerId}
mapper.delete: delete from resources where path_id=#{id}; delete from path_data where id=#{id};
